headline: Trump Endorses Dr. Oz in Pennsylvania's Crowded GOP Senate Primary
sentences: Gonzalez continued, "Just having Trump's endorsement does not guarantee that you're going to win and so you have a wide variety of candidates from Congresswoman Liz Cheney in Wyoming who I think faces a very serious primary to Congressman Tom Rice of South Carolina who isn't at as much a risk of losing a primary."
